user_bio:
Data Analyst, Automation Developer, and AI Workflow Specialist with experience designing end-to-end systems using n8n and its integrations. I help businesses unlock insights, automate operations, and scale with custom AI-powered workflows, dynamic dashboards, and no-code tools. My work combines strong analytical thinking with smart automation — from data collection and enrichment to lead generation, reporting, and AI agent orchestration.
